analysis.description:
PresaleBonuses.presaleBonusApplicator (/unique_chucks/8/0x708352cd28ea06e6bbd5c1a9408b4966ac1226e4.sol#528-591) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- day == 2 && hour >= 16 && hour < 20
	- (day == 2 && hour >= 20) || (day == 3 && hour < 5)
	- (day == 2 && hour >= 20) || (day == 3 && hour < 5)
	- (day == 3 && hour >= 5) || (day == 4 && hour < 5)
	- (day == 3 && hour >= 5) || (day == 4 && hour < 5)
	- day == 22 && hour < 5
	- (day == 22 && hour >= 5) || (day == 23 && hour < 5)
	- (day == 22 && hour >= 5) || (day == 23 && hour < 5)
	- (day == 23 && hour >= 5) || (day == 24 && hour < 5)
	- (day == 23 && hour >= 5) || (day == 24 && hour < 5)
	- (day == 24 && hour >= 5) || (day == 25 && hour < 5)
	- (day == 24 && hour >= 5) || (day == 25 && hour < 5)

Reentrancy in Campaign.sendReward (/unique_chucks/8/0x708352cd28ea06e6bbd5c1a9408b4966ac1226e4.sol#1071-1093):
	External calls:
	- token.transferReward(_who,_amount) (/unique_chucks/8/0x708352cd28ea06e6bbd5c1a9408b4966ac1226e4.sol#1082-1085)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- cost (/unique_chucks/8/0x708352cd28ea06e6bbd5c1a9408b4966ac1226e4.sol#1086)
inviteeNode in Referral.addInvitee (/unique_chucks/8/0x708352cd28ea06e6bbd5c1a9408b4966ac1226e4.sol#107-108) is a local variable never initialiazed
amountWithdrawable in Vesting.revokeSchedule (/unique_chucks/8/0x708352cd28ea06e6bbd5c1a9408b4966ac1226e4.sol#1289) is a local variable never initialiazed

Campaign.sendReward (/unique_chucks/8/0x708352cd28ea06e6bbd5c1a9408b4966ac1226e4.sol#1071-1093) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferReward(_who,_amount) (/unique_chucks/8/0x708352cd28ea06e6bbd5c1a9408b4966ac1226e4.sol#1082-1085)

VyralSale.initPresale (/unique_chucks/8/0x708352cd28ea06e6bbd5c1a9408b4966ac1226e4.sol#1514-1554) does not use the value returned by external calls:

VyralSale.buyPresale (/unique_chucks/8/0x708352cd28ea06e6bbd5c1a9408b4966ac1226e4.sol#1616-1666) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-shareToken.transfer(msg.sender,purchased) (/unique_chucks/8/0x708352cd28ea06e6bbd5c1a9408b4966ac1226e4.sol#1644)
	-campaign.sendReward(msg.sender,reward) (/unique_chucks/8/0x708352cd28ea06e6bbd5c1a9408b4966ac1226e4.sol#1652-1655)

VyralSale.buySale (/unique_chucks/8/0x708352cd28ea06e6bbd5c1a9408b4966ac1226e4.sol#1666-1713) does not use the value returned by external calls:

VyralSale.replaceDecomissioned (/unique_chucks/8/0x708352cd28ea06e6bbd5c1a9408b4966ac1226e4.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-shareToken.transfer(_newAddress,allTokens) (/unique_chucks/8/0x708352cd28ea06e6bbd5c1a9408b4966ac1226e4.sol)

VyralSale.setVesting (/unique_chucks/8/0x708352cd28ea06e6bbd5c1a9408b4966ac1226e4.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-shareToken.approve(address(vestingWallet),TEAM.add(PARTNERS)) (/unique_chucks/8/0x708352cd28ea06e6bbd5c1a9408b4966ac1226e4.sol)

	- hour < 5 (/unique_chucks/8/0x708352cd28ea06e6bbd5c1a9408b4966ac1226e4.sol#559-563)
	- (day == 24 && hour >= 5) || (day == 25 && hour < 5) (/unique_chucks/8/0x708352cd28ea06e6bbd5c1a9408b4966ac1226e4.sol#585-591)
	- (day == 23 && hour >= 5) || (day == 24 && hour < 5) (/unique_chucks/8/0x708352cd28ea06e6bbd5c1a9408b4966ac1226e4.sol#577-584)
	- (day == 3 && hour >= 5) || (day == 4 && hour < 5) (/unique_chucks/8/0x708352cd28ea06e6bbd5c1a9408b4966ac1226e4.sol#553-557)
	- day == 22 && hour < 5 (/unique_chucks/8/0x708352cd28ea06e6bbd5c1a9408b4966ac1226e4.sol#565-571)
